means: [地名]苏美尔（位于巴比伦南部的世界古老文明的发源地之一）

sentence.Network_en: Sumer and Akkad occupied by foreign troops loyal to Enlil and Ninurta.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏美尔和阿卡德被效忠于伊利尔和尼奴塔的外来军队占领.

sentence.Network_en: Civilization blossoms out in Sumer ( the First Region ).
sentence.Network_cn: 文明在苏美尔发展 ( 第一个区域 ).

sentence.Network_en: Sumer and its great civilization lie prostrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏美尔和它的伟大文明衰竭了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 苏美尔(Sumer)文明很可能是我们地球上人类本次文明中最早的文明。苏美尔的乌鲁克城(Uruk),很可能是人类本次文明中的第一座城市。苏美尔文明在7000 到6000年前.

means.word_mean: 1. an area in the southern region of Babylonia in present-day Iraq; site of the Sumerian civilization of city-states that flowered during the third millennium BC
